actions.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the concurrence of the House to the amendment of the Senate to the bill (H.R. 4531) with amendments.

summary.text: Provides for taking H.R. 4531 (wildlife refuges) from the Speaker's table and concurring in the Senate amendment with certain amendments.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the concurrence of the House to the amendment of the Senate to the bill (H.R. 4531) with amendments.
